trans-unit.source: The type of object that is to be converted.
The type the input object is to be converted to.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件要轉換成的型別。

trans-unit.source: Represents a method that converts an object from one type to another type.
trans-unit.target: 表示將物件從某個型別轉換成另一個型別的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <typeparamref name="TOutput" /> that represents the converted <typeparamref name="TInput" />.

This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method of the <xref:System.Array> class and the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> class to convert each element of the collection from one type to another.
trans-unit.target: 此委派由<xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>類別和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*>方法<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>類別來轉換到另一個集合的每個項目類型。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。

trans-unit.source: The first demonstrates the <xref:System.Converter%602> delegate with the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method of the <xref:System.Array> class, and the second demonstrates the delegate with the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> generic class.
trans-unit.target: 第一個範例示範<xref:System.Converter%602>委派與<xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法<xref:System.Array>類別，而第二個示範如何使用委派<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*>方法<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>泛型類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會定義方法，名為`PointFToPoint`將轉換<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構以<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an array of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立的陣列<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構、 建立`Converter<PointF, Point>`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派<xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Array.ConvertAll%2A>方法會將傳遞的輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: The following code example defines a method named `PointFToPoint` that converts a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structure to a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會定義方法，名為`PointFToPoint`將轉換<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構以<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。

trans-unit.source: The example then creates a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of <xref:System.Drawing.PointF> structures, creates a `Converter\<PointF, Point>` delegate (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)` in Visual Basic) to represent the `PointFToPoint` method, and passes the delegate to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會建立<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>的<xref:System.Drawing.PointF>結構、 建立`Converter\<PointF, Point>`委派 (`Converter(Of PointF, Point)`在 Visual Basic 中) 來代表`PointFToPoint`方法，並傳遞至委派<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*> method passes each element of the input list to the `PointFToPoint` method and puts the converted elements into a new list of <xref:System.Drawing.Point> structures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List`1.ConvertAll*>方法會將傳遞的輸入清單的每個項目`PointFToPoint`方法並將已轉換的項目放入新的清單<xref:System.Drawing.Point>結構。
